metadata.title: CVE-2018-16870 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: It was found that wolfssl before 3.15.7 is vulnerable to a new variant ofthe Bleichenbacher attack to perform downgrade attacks against TLS. Thismay lead to leakage of sensible data.

criterions.comment: wolfssl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
